WRITING.TITLE: Should I keep Reading?
WRITING.TEXT:
I really love the characters, but can't get into the plot. To me, it's getting to be a lot of reading through repetitive chatlogs are overcomplicated exposition. So I have a question or two:
Considering this, should ai continue reading? I'd like to get more dharacters, or develop old ones more. Am I remotely close to being up in speed (probably not)?
